Reviews.Title: Piece of Junk!!
Reviews.Author: jen saletel
Reviews.Content: Ordered this for myself, returned it immediately!! Screen is tiny, and hard to see what you are even taking a picture of. Decided to see what they looked like when you put them on my computer and they were worse than I thought they would be. Even for the price this camers is not a good deal!!

Reviews.Title: It works just fine, but not user-friendly.
Reviews.Author: kelly nielcen
Reviews.Content: While my expectations weren't that high for a cheap camera, I was expecting it to be more user friendly. I find it very difficult to understand. Simple functions, such as turning the flash on and off and switching between picture and video modes, are extremely confusing. Had I spent more money on this camera, I'd be more upset. But for $36, I guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: VERY limited
Reviews.Author: Becky Baker-Hall "bbhall2002"
Reviews.Content: I'm so disappointed in this camera. You have to be absolutely still when taking a photo or it will be blurry. Indoor photos with low lighting... forget it. Even a tripod can't help get these photos clear. I will end up giving it to our kids. I guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: pics ok, but vids sadly lack
Reviews.Author: William P. Caloia Sr. "Truth Teller"
Reviews.Content: Pictures are fine. You can count every slice of pepperoni on your pizza. You can even count the whiskers on your cat. However, videos lack definition and blur easily. The camera is set up to be easy for right handed folks, but awkward for us southpaws. It is not as good as my old 4 megapixel Olympus.

Reviews.Title: Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Eboni Brickhouse
Reviews.Content: The camera was a little more basic than I anticipated. But since it is for a child, it will do the trick

Reviews.Title: Ok little camera
Reviews.Author: Danette C. Cannon "krizcnn"
Reviews.Content: The details say 3 AAA batteries required (included), but they are not.  And also will need to purchase the SD card separately, things to consider before you buy but works great.

ProductInfo.Features:
Vivitar photo editing app
4x digital zoom
Connects to iPad
SD card supported
7.1MP (3648 x 2048 resolution)
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar V17-WHT 7.1MP Digital Camera with 1.8-Inch TFT LCD (White)
